title: 718: BITCOIN WILL DOUBLE TO 6-FIGURES IN LATE 2021 OR EARLY 2022, PREDICTS STANDARD CHARTERED!!!!
description:
Bitcoin will surge 115% from current levels to $100K either late this year or early next year, and could reach $175K in the long term, Standard Chartered's crypto research team has forecast.

The bank's team said it "structurally" values bitcoin between the range of $50K to $175K. "Cyclically, we expect a peak around $100K in late 2021 or early 2022," they shared.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
